[She]148-esther is [the only passenger for [Glan - yr - Afon]24-glan - yr - afon]4675-the only passenger for glan - yr - afon ; and [the man who unites in [himself]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter the functions of [station - master and porter]4677-station - master and porter]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter looks at [her]148-esther with a recognising eye . [He]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter must know whether [Jack]146-jack is alive or dead . [He]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter looks much as usual , but so [he]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter would whether [Jack]146-jack were alive or dead . Feeling an overmastering sense of fear of and repugnance from the news [he]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter may have to give [her]148-esther , [she]148-esther runs to [the little wicket that leads out into [the road]3569-the road]4678-the little wicket that leads out into the road . "[1911-miss] [Your]1949-your ticket , please , [miss]1911-miss ! " cries [the man]3894-the man , following [her]148-esther . [She]148-esther had forgotten it ; it takes a minute to extricate it from [her]148-esther glove ; [she]148-esther thinks that [he]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter looks as if [he]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter were going to speak ; and , in a blind terror of what [he]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter might say , turns from [him]4676-the man who unites in himself the functions of station - master and porter and rushes down [the road]3569-the road . Any suspense is better than some certainties . [THE mountains]4682-the mountains stand still and drowsy in the sleepiness of midday . Through the mistiness of the air , the russet glories of the dying bracken blaze on [their]4682-the mountains breasts : [the oak - woods]4683-the oak - woods still keep their deep dusk green , but the sycamore has felt the kiss of winter , and is growing red and sere beneath it . The sun is reigning , sole despot of the sky , having banished every rebel cloud beyond the horizon 's limits . It is almost always fine weather when [we]4684-us are most miserable . Whatever [poets]4685-poets say to the contrary , [Nature]162-nature is not sympathetic : rather is [she]162-nature very insolent to [us]4684-us in [her]162-nature triumphant , durable beauty . [She]0-i loves to say to [us]4684-us , "[1911-miss] Though [you]1951-you are weeping , [my]0-i eyes are dry : though [you]1951-you are very sick and feeble , [I]0-i am strong and fair : though [you]1951-you are most short - lived , here to - day and gone to - morrow , [I]0-i am eternal , [I]0-i endure . " In [the meadow]3756-the meadow below [the house]687-the house , [[Jack]146-jack 's sheep]4688-jack 's sheep are browsing — the Cheviots that [he]146-jack was so proud of : down [the stony , steep back - road]4689-the stony , steep back - road the cart - horses come jogging , to be watered at [the pool at [the hill - foot]4691-the hill - foot]4690-the pool at the hill - foot . With shortened breath and straining muscles , [Esther]148-esther runs fleetly past [them]4688-jack 's sheep , not daring to look into [the carter]3469-the carter 's face . Through the gate , by [the stables]699-the stables , and then [the familiar little old house]4694-the familiar little old house comes in sight , with [its]4694-the familiar little old house high - pitched roof and [its]4694-the familiar little old house old - fashioned chimney- pots . White pigeons are walking about on the gravelled sweep , bowing and scraping , and making love , with a formal solemnity worthy of [Sir Charles Grandison]335-sir charles . The Virginia creeper 's scarlet banners wave from the wall ; [the hall]658-the hall - window is open ; on the ledge lies a tabby cat , with one eye open and the other shut ; two cocks are crowing in emulous rivalry in [the farmyard]4696-the farmyard . Everything looks peaceful , happy , alive . Gathering a little feeble hope from these signs , [Esther]148-esther collects [her]148-esther small remnant of breath , and runs towards the door . [She]148-esther has nearly reached [it]4694-the familiar little old house , when , stepping hastily out from [the porch]3524-the porch , [one]559-one comes to meet [her]148-esther : one , but not [the one]3424-the one : [he]1952-he will pass through [that porch]4700-that porch but once again , and then not of [his]1952-he own accord , but borne heavily on [others]4701-others ' shoulders . Unable to frame any speech , [Esther]148-esther looks up mutely in [Brandon]147-robert 's face ( for it is [he]147-robert ) , and there reads [her]148-esther doom . "[1952-he] [He]1952-he is dead — [he]1952-he is dead ! " [she]148-esther sees written wetly on either eye . "[1952-he] [He]1952-he is better off than [we]1953-us are , " says [the young man]670-the young man , brokenly , taking hold of both [her]148-esther hands . [She]148-esther sits down heavily on the bench in [the porch]3524-the porch : what hurry is there now ? After all , it is but a poor shabby remnant of [us]1953-us that [Death]192-death gets when [he]1952-he makes [his]1952-he final claim upon [us]1953-us ; in most of [us]1953-us [the greater , better part]4704-the greater , better part has died long before . Of [Esther]148-esther , three - fourths died as [she]148-esther sat on the oak bench in [the porch]3524-the porch that autumn morning : breath remained , and blood still circulated through veins and arteries , and speech and hearing were left ; but youth , and hope , and heart , died very suddenly and utterly , to come back to life again never any more . [She]148-esther sits staring vacantly at the seat opposite [her]148-esther for several minutes , and then speaks distinctly , almost loudly : "[1952-he] " How long ago ? "[682-the girl] " About eight , "[147-robert] answers [Brandon]147-robert , briefly and sadly , turning away [his]147-robert head to hide [his]147-robert womanish tears for [the young fellow that fell asleep so gently in [his]147-robert arms , in the early morning , when [other folks]1955-other folks were waking]1954-the young fellow that fell asleep so gently in his arms , in the early morning , when other folks were waking . " What was it killed [him]190-bob ? "[682-the girl] asks [the girl]682-the girl , in the same hard , clear voice . [Bob]190-bob looks at [her]682-the girl in astonishment : [he]190-bob had been steeling [himself]190-bob against faintings , hysterics , a , terrible scene of shrieks and wailings , but this conscious stony collectedness fills [him]190-bob with a fearful surprise . " It was diphtheria , "[147-robert] [he]147-robert answers , sorrowfully taking [her]682-the girl hand again , and stroking it , while [his]147-robert hot tears fall thick upon it . [She]682-the girl leaves it in [his]147-robert , passive as the hand of a statue , unknowing , indifferent , whether [he]147-robert held it or not . " Did [he]147-robert suffer much ? "[682-the girl] [she]682-the girl inquires , lifting [her]682-the girl lovely , hopeless eyes piteously to [his]147-robert face . " Not at the last , "[682-the girl] answers [Brandon]190-bob , evasively , almost under [his]190-bob breath . Silence for a few seconds : the cocks are still crowing , the pigeons courting the cat purring on the window - sill : [Nature]162-nature is fond of these horrible contrasts . Presently [she]682-the girl speaks again : " Why was not [I]682-the girl sent for before ? "[682-the girl] [she]682-the girl asks in a rough , harsh whisper . " [We]4706-we telegraphed for [you]682-the girl yesterday morning , the instant that [we]4706-we found there was any danger , "[147-robert] [he]147-robert replies , speaking very gently , but wincing a little under the reproach implied in [her]682-the girl question . " And it did not reach [me]682-the girl till this morning . If [I]682-the girl had had it when [I]682-the girl ought , [I]682-the girl suppose [I]682-the girl should have been in time to see [him]147-robert , "[682-the girl] [she]682-the girl says , with apathy , looking away towards [the misty hill]1957-the misty hill . " [He]147-robert sent [you]682-the girl [[his]147-robert love]4707-his love , "[190-bob] says [Brandon]190-bob , struggling again with that same breaking in [his]190-bob voice . " [Dear fellow]4708-dear fellow ! [he]147-robert was quite happy ! "[190-bob] " Was [he]147-robert ? "[682-the girl] [she]682-the girl says , with the same vacant look . " [I]682-the girl 'll go to [him]147-robert . "[682-the girl] As [she]682-the girl speaks , [she]682-the girl rises and moves towards the door . " [You]682-the girl had better not , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says hastily , laying [his]190-bob hand on [her]682-the girl arm . " Why ? "[682-the girl] inquires [she]682-the girl , looking at [him]190-bob with perfect calmness ; " are [you]190-bob afraid of [my]682-the girl fainting or going into hysterics ? [You]190-bob need not be ; it is only that [I]682-the girl am not the least sorry that [Jack]146-jack is dead , and that [I]682-the girl want to be . "[682-the girl] " It is not that , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob answers , earnestly ; " but — but — [you]682-the girl know , [dear]951-dear , that it is a terribly infectious complaint . "[190-bob] " Is it ? "[682-the girl] [she]682-the girl answers , a ray of animation lighting up [her]682-the girl haggard face . " [I]682-the girl 'm glad ; perhaps [God]435-god will let [me]682-the girl catch it ! "[682-the girl] Seeing that [she]682-the girl is resolute , [he]190-bob ceases trying to dissuade [her]682-the girl . In [the small dark hall]1958-the small dark hall , [old Luath]186-old luath is lying on the rug ; seeing [Esther]148-esther enter , [he]186-old luath raises [himself]186-old luath quickly , and goes to meet [her]148-esther , with heavy tail wagging and affectionate eyes , on which age is written in blue dimness . Now that [[the master]1959-the master 's sister]1960-the master 's sister has come [home]701-home , [he]186-old luath is sure that [the master]1959-the master can not be far behind . [He]1959-the master is waiting for [him]1959-the master , waiting to walk round [the farm]3468-the farm ; [he]1959-the master has been waiting this long time , thinking that [he]1959-the master has gone upon a journey ; and so [he]1959-the master has . But oh ! [Luath]186-old luath , it is a journey on which [man]3613-man may take neither horse nor dog , [neither wife]1965-neither wife , nor [sister]3516-sister , nor [friend]1967-friend ; a journey on which [some man]1968-some man , [woman]3638-woman , or [child]3639-child is setting off every minute that beats ; and whence [no explorers]1971-no explorers return , with maps and charts , and wondrous tales , to vaunt [themselves]1971-no explorers of [their]1971-no explorers exploits , and be extolled and praised as benefactors to [[their]1971-no explorers race]1972-their race . Let [us]1973-us hope that it is because [they]1971-no explorers find [that country]1974-that country most pleasant that [they]1971-no explorers come not again . In [the drawing - room]787-the drawing - room a canary is shrilling [his]1976-his loud , sharp song : [they]1977-we have thrown a shawl over [his]1976-his cage to keep [him]1976-his quiet ; but through the shawl the sun pierces , and the bird 's keen clear jubilation goes up to meet it . How can [he]1976-his sing so very gaily now [Jack]146-jack is dead ? At [the room]3629-the room - door [they]1977-we pause . " Do n't come in ! [I]1977-we 'd rather have [him]146-jack to [myself]1977-we , please , "[1977-we] [Esther]148-esther says , in a steady whisper . " Promise not to kiss [him]146-jack , [Essie]180-essie ! "[148-esther] [Brandon]190-bob rejoins , very earnestly ; also in a whisper , " [We]1977-we can not spare [you]180-essie too . "[190-bob] [She]148-esther takes no notice of [his]190-bob request , but , opening the door gently , enters [the chamber]1979-the chamber , where [the king of [kings]1981-kings]1980-the king of kings , and [lord of lords]1982-lord of lords , almighty [Death]192-death — before whom [we]1977-we all grovelling do unwilling obeisance — is holding one of [[his]190-bob myriad courts]1983-his myriad courts . [It]1979-the chamber is but [a small , slightly furnished room in which [he]190-bob is holding [this one]1985-this one]1984-a small , slightly furnished room in which he is holding this one , but that concerns [him]190-bob but little . [[His]190-bob majesty]1986-his majesty is so great that [he]190-bob can afford to dispense with the adventitious adjuncts of pomp and circumstance . Without [his]190-bob crown and sceptre , without [[his]190-bob courtiers]1987-his courtiers — [Plague]405-plague , Pestilence , and Famine — [he]190-bob is still very king and [emperor]1988-emperor . The window is open , but the white curtains drawn—"While through the lattice ivy shadows creep . "[190-bob] On the table stand physic - bottles — puny foils with which [we]1977-we fence with death — and an open Bible , out of which [Brandon]190-bob , with shaking voice , and a weak , dying hand held in [his]190-bob strong tender one , read the old comfortable words that have soothed many a transit , to [the young traveller who was setting out meekly , and not fearfully , in the autumn morning]1989-the young traveller who was setting out meekly , and not fearfully , in the autumn morning . Over the bed spreads a white sheet , and beneath it a formless form ! Can that be [Jack]146-jack ? Can that be [Jack]146-jack , lying still and idle in the bright midday?—Jack , to whom the shelter of [a house]4042-a house was ever irksome , who was up and about at cock - crow , to whom all weathers were the same , and the bracing wind blowing about [the heathery hills]1991-the heathery hills the very breath of [his]146-jack nostrils ? A feeling of incredulity steals over [her]1992-her . [She]1992-her walks to the bed and turns down the sheet from the face , and the incredulity deepens into incredulous awe . Oh , [ye]1993-ye liars ! all [ye]1993-ye that say that sleep and death are alike ! what kinship is there between the pliant relaxer of soft limbs , the light brief slumber , that , at any trivial noise , a trumpeting gnat or distant calling voice , flies and is dissolved , and the grave stiff whiteness of that profoundest rest that [no thousand booming cannons , no rock - rending earthquake , no earth - riving thunderbolt]1994-no thousand booming cannons , no rock - rending earthquake , no earth - riving thunderbolt can break ? It is an insult to [that strong narcotic]1995-that strong narcotic to liken any other repose to that [he]146-jack gives . [They]1996-they have crossed [the young fellow]695-the young fellow 's hands upon [his]695-the young fellow unheaving breast , meekly , as the hands of one that prayeth ; and laid sprigs of grey - flowered rosemary in them . [She]1992-her looks at [him]695-the young fellow steadfastly , a great , awful amazement in [her]1992-her dilated eyes . Is this [the boy that whistled " [I]4710-the boy that whistled " i paddle my own canoe paddle [[my]4710-the boy that whistled " i paddle my own canoe own canoe]3390-my own canoe]4710-the boy that whistled " i paddle my own canoe "[4710-the boy that whistled " i paddle my own canoe] — whose step , glad and noisy , echoed about the stairs?—the boy that sat and smoked at the study window , with [her]1992-her fond head resting on [his]695-the young fellow young slight shoulder?—the boy that was worried about failing crops and barren [land?—the boy whose laugh had a sincerer ring in it than [any one else]777-any one else 's , who made so many jokes , and had such a light heart]1998-land?—the boy whose laugh had a sincerer ring in it than any one else 's , who made so many jokes , and had such a light heart ? Can this be [he]695-the young fellow — this white , awful , beautiful statue ? Was ever crowned king , in purple and minever , half so majestical as [he]695-the young fellow , as [he]695-the young fellow lies on [his]695-the young fellow narrow bed in [the scant poor room]2000-the scant poor room , with that serene stern smile that only dead mouths wear on [his]695-the young fellow solemn changed face — that smile that seems to say , " [I]148-esther have overcome ! [I]148-esther know ! "[148-esther] [Esther]148-esther 's love for [Jack]146-jack is great as love can be — greater than [Jonathan]406-jonathan 's for [David]193-king david , greater than [David]193-king david 's for [Absalom]407-absalom ; and [this pale , prone figure]2001-this pale , prone figure is unearthly fair and grand ; but can [she]148-esther connect the two ideas ? What have [they]2002-they to say to [one another]922-one another ? Can [she]148-esther realise that if this form be not [[her]148-esther brother]644-her brother , neither will [she]148-esther find [him]644-her brother again on [the earth]708-the earth 's face , though [she]148-esther seek [him]644-her brother carefully with tears . For one instant it comes home to [her]148-esther ; for one instant light darts into [her]148-esther soul — light keen and cruel as the forked lightning flash that , on some mirk night , glares blinding bright into [a dark room]2006-a dark room , illumining every object as with the furnace - fires of hell ! [She]148-esther sinks on [her]148-esther trembling knees by the bedside , and says , with dumb , heart - wrung entreaty — " [God God]4712-god god ! [God]435-god ! give [him]644-her brother back to [me]148-esther , or let [me]148-esther go where [he]644-her brother is . "[148-esther] But [the great Lord that said once , " Lazarus]4713-the great lord that said once , " lazarus , come forth ! "[4713-the great lord that said once , " lazarus] has said " Come forth ! "[4713-the great lord that said once , " lazarus] to never another since [him]644-her brother . " Lie [thou]4714-thou still , till [I]644-her brother call [thee]4714-thou ! "[644-her brother] [He]644-her brother says ; and [none durst]2007-none durst move hand or foot . But since [he]644-her brother can not come to [her]148-esther , why should not [she]148-esther go to [him]644-her brother ? Has the disease that slew [him]644-her brother spent all its force on that one slight frame ? Is not there enough of it left to kill [her]148-esther too ? It was [Juliet]408-juliet 's thought when [she]408-juliet spake reproachingly to [[her]408-juliet dead Romeo]2008-her dead romeo , as [she]408-juliet looked into the empty poison - cup — ' Oh , [churl]2009-churl ! drink all and leave no friendly drop , To help [me]0-i after—. " Suddenly [Brandon]190-bob 's beseeching words recur to [her]148-esther : "[408-juliet] Promise not to kiss [him]644-her brother , [Essie]180-essie ! " If [she]148-esther kiss [him]644-her brother , [he]644-her brother may give [her]148-esther the boon of death . Instantly [she]148-esther rises , and stooping over [him]644-her brother , lays [her]148-esther tremulous warm lips on [his]644-her brother still cheek . The unearthly awful cold of the contact between the dead and the living strikes a chilly shrinking along [her]148-esther veins and limbs ; but not for that shrinking does [she]148-esther desist . Again and again [she]148-esther kisses [him]644-her brother , driven on by that strong drear hope , saying moaningly , "[180-essie] [[My]0-i boy]832-my boy ! [my]0-i boy!—give it [me]0-i ! give it [me]0-i ! " Then unbelief comes back . This is not [Jack]146-jack : [he]644-her brother is somewhere else . [She]148-esther will find [him]644-her brother by - and - by . This is very terrible , this present experience , but [she]148-esther catches [herself]148-esther thinking [she]148-esther will tell [Jack]146-jack all about it when [she]148-esther sees [him]644-her brother . To the incredulity succeeds a stupid apathy . [She]148-esther sinks down upon [her]148-esther knees again , with [her]148-esther elbows resting on the counterpane , and fixes [her]148-esther stony eyes upon [the dead stripling]4715-the dead stripling ; watches [him]644-her brother ; looks at [him]644-her brother steadfastly , without intermission ; looks at "[0-i] the shell of a flown bird , " as [the old philosopher]4716-the old philosopher very grandly said . [She]148-esther does not know how long [she]148-esther means to stay [there]594-there ; [she]148-esther does not know how long [she]148-esther has already staid [there]594-there ; when [some one entering]4719-some one entering , lays [his]4719-some one entering hand upon [her]148-esther shoulder , and says , with kindly gravity , "[0-i] Come away , [dear]951-dear ! " "[951-dear] [I]0-i am doing no harm ! " [she]0-i answers dully , not moving [her]0-i eyes . "[951-dear] Come , [darling]2012-darling ! " [he]4719-some one entering says , not attempting to reason with [her]148-esther , but speaking in the coaxing tone [one]559-one would use to [a fractious sickly child]4721-a fractious sickly child . [She]148-esther answers neither "[2012-darling] Ay " nor "[951-dear] Nay ; " [she]148-esther neither resists nor consents , and so , half carrying , half leading , [he]4719-some one entering takes [her]148-esther from [the room]3629-the room , and [they]4723-they leave poor [Jack]146-jack lying all alone in [his]146-jack shroud , smiling sternly sweet . SO the blinds are drawn down ; a sort of notice that [people]3426-people put in [their]3426-people windows , saying , "[951-dear] Do not look in , or [you]951-dear will see [Death]192-death ! " and [the few neighbours round]4725-the few neighbours round drive up and inquire how [Miss Craven]164-st. john is , and are informed that [she]164-st. john is pretty well . And [the servants]4284-the servants each do the other 's work ; and there is a general interesting bouleversement in [the household]4727-the household , and much chattering and crying and a stream of visitors in [the kitchen]1014-the kitchen . And [Brandon]190-bob goes hither and thither , taking upon [himself]190-bob all the drear work of arranging [Jack]146-jack 's final departure from [[his]146-jack home among [the mountains]4682-the mountains]4729-his home among the mountains , and keeping at bay [[his]190-bob mothers]4731-his mothers and sisters , who , armed with bibles , hymnals , and "[192-death] Reflections for [a Mourner]2013-a mourner , " are prepared to sally forth in proselytising ardour upon the conquest of [Esther]148-esther 's soul . And [Esther]148-esther [herself]148-esther is , for the time , soulless as the fair marble mask in [the quiet room up stairs]4732-the quiet room up stairs . "[2014-his] [His]2014-his lips are very mild and meek;Though [one]559-one should smite [him]2014-his on the cheek , Or on the mouth , [he]2014-his will not speak . " If [ary one]4733-ary one were to smite [her]4733-ary one on lip or cheek , neither would [she]4733-ary one resent it or complain ; [she]4733-ary one sits in an armchair , in [the drawing - room]787-the drawing - room , with [her]4733-ary one hands folded in [her]4733-ary one lap , and [the servants]4284-the servants bring [her]4733-ary one tea every half - hour ( incessant tea being supposed to be the necessary accompaniment of great grief ) , and request [her]4733-ary one to "[559-one] keep up . " So [she]4733-ary one sits in the armchair all day long - trying to be sorry , trying to weep . [She]4733-ary one has had [Sarah]160-sarah in , and has made [her]160-sarah tell [her]160-sarah all the particulars of [[her]4733-ary one brother]644-her brother 's last hours ; has listened attentively while [the woman]3893-the woman — the easy tears streaming down [her]3893-the woman cheeks — relates how "[166-mr. brandon] [Mr. Brandon]166-mr. brandon was with [poor master]2016-poor master all along , from the very first , and if [he]166-mr. brandon had been [[his]166-mr. brandon own born brother]2017-his own born brother , [he]166-mr. brandon could not have been kinder , " and how [he]2018-master lifted [him]166-mr. brandon up in [his]2018-master arms , and laid [his]166-mr. brandon head on [his]2018-master shoulder — "[166-mr. brandon] [Master]2018-master could breathe easier so , poor dear young gentleman!—and [he]2018-master ( [master]2019-master ) had been so pleasant - spoken to the last , and had said , said [he]2018-master , ' God bless [you]2020-you , [old fellow]1424-old fellow ! [I]0-i 'd have done as much for [you]2020-you , if [I]0-i had had the chance ; ' and how , about seven o'clock , [he]2018-master had asked what o'clock it was — [we]2022-we all knew what that meant — and had then seemed to fall asleep in [Mr. Brandon]166-mr. brandon 's arms , and just as the clock struck eight , [he]2018-master gave a sigh — like that — and a sort of pleasant bit of a smile , and was gone all in a minute ! " It is very touching , but it does not touch [Esther]148-esther . [She]148-esther rises and walks into [the hall]658-the hall , and looks at [his]166-mr. brandon greatcoat and [his]166-mr. brandon hat , and kisses [his]166-mr. brandon gloves , that seem to retain somewhat of the shape of the kind hands that once filled them . [She]148-esther thinks resolutely of how [he]166-mr. brandon has been [[her]148-esther one friend]4739-her one friend throughout life ; thinks of the presents [he]166-mr. brandon gave [her]148-esther , and of how seldom [he]166-mr. brandon went to [any town]4740-any town without bringing [her]148-esther some little remembrance back from it ; thinks of that last five - pound note , so hardly spared , and yet so very gladly given ; thinks of how poor [he]166-mr. brandon was , how slight , how young . But it is all no good ; it seems to [her]148-esther like some pathetic tale about [a stranger that [she]148-esther is telling [herself]148-esther]4741-a stranger that she is telling herself . And the days pass , and [she]148-esther grows weak from inanition , but refuses all food . If [she]148-esther can be unnatural , horrible enough to feel hunger and thirst now [Jack]146-jack is dead , at all events [she]148-esther will not indulge [her]148-esther low nature ; and so [she]148-esther eats not , and [her]148-esther pulse grows feeble , "[2018-master] And all the wheels of being slow ! " So it comes to pass that [she]148-esther falls sick and is carried up to bed , and lies there half in sleep , half in insensibility . And the mornings and the evenings go by , and [Jack]146-jack 's burial - day comes . [They]4742-they had hoped that it would have passed without [her]148-esther knowing , but it was not so . Now that [he]146-jack is leaving [[his]146-jack home]4743-his home for this last time , [he]146-jack does not go light - springing down [the stairs]4744-the stairs , as at other times , but with much tramping of strange feet , with purposed muffling of strange voices . How can [she]148-esther fail to hear , "[2018-master] The steps of [the bearers]2023-the bearers heavy and slow ? " Through all [her]148-esther trance it breaks ; from [her]148-esther little latticed window , with [her]148-esther sick limbs trembling beneath [her]148-esther , and [her]148-esther miserable eyes nailed to the gaoler coffin , in whose strait custody [her]148-esther dead lies prisoned , [she]148-esther sees [the drooped pall]4745-the drooped pall and [the black - scarfed mourners]4746-the black - scarfed mourners . [These mourners]4747-these mourners are but few , for [Jack]146-jack — though now awfuller than [any absolutest monarch]4748-any absolutest monarch — was , in life , poor and of little consequence : the gap made by the extinction of that one young life is but narrow . Standing there , [she]148-esther feels a pang of bitter regret and anguish that there are [not more people]4749-not more people to be sorry for [Jack]146-jack . And so , being weak , the fountains of [her]148-esther soul are broken up within [her]148-esther , and [she]148-esther falls to weeping mightily ; and , but for that weeping , [she]148-esther would , perchance , have died , some say ; but [I]435-god think not — for why should grief , being [our]4750-our natural element , kill [us]4750-our any more than water the fish , or air the bird ? THUS the grave yawns for [another victim]4751-another victim , and having swallowed [him]4751-another victim , and a million more that same day , returns to its former state of insatiable famished greed . It is a law — natural , wise , and comprehensible by the feeblest understanding — that [all created beings , in which there is progressive life]4752-all created beings , in which there is progressive life , must come forth , ripen , decay , and fall . But why , oh ! why , in too many cases does the decay and fall forerun the ripening ? Why is so many a worm permitted to gnaw out so many a closed bud 's green heart ? Why is the canker death allowed to pasture on so many an unblown life ? Why are [so many little toddling children]4753-so many little toddling children , not yet come into the heritage of reason to which [we]4750-our are all by [our]4750-our human birth entitled , borne from [[their]4753-so many little toddling children mother]4754-their mother 's emptied arms to [their]4753-so many little toddling children small short graves ? Is it , as [Hartley Coleridge]409-hartley coleridge very nobly , whether truly or untruly , said — "[435-god] [God]435-god only made [them]2024-them for [[his]435-god Christ]2025-his christ to save ? " Very wasteful is [the mighty mother]4755-the mighty mother , knowing that [her]4755-the mighty mother materials are inexhaustible . And so [they]2024-them lay [Jack]146-jack down in [the wormy grave]4756-the wormy grave . "[410-bear] [Bear]410-bear , bear [him]435-god along , With [his]435-god few faults shut up like [dead flow'rets]2026-dead flow'rets . " [No one]891-no one will ever abuse [him]435-god or say anything ill - natured of [him]435-god again ; for to speak evil of the helpless , speechless , answerless dead , requires a heart as bad , a nature as cowardly vile , as [his]435-god must be that foully murders [a young child]4758-a young child . And [the mourners]4759-the mourners go [home]701-home , and take off [their]4759-the mourners hatbands and scarves , and give [them]4759-the mourners to [[their]4759-the mourners wives]4761-their wives to make aprons of . And [old Luath]186-old luath lies in [the hall]658-the hall , watching still , with ears attentively pricked at any incoming footstep , and hope drooping , as day droops too , begins to howl dismally towards sun - down . And [Esther—"You]411-esther—"you[410-bear] ought not to grieve for [him]435-god ; it is a happy change for [him]435-god ; [he]435-god is in Heaven ! " So [they]4759-the mourners had said to [her]4763-she weepingly , as [people]3426-people do say to [us]4765-us , when the desire of [our]4765-us eyes has left [us]4765-us ; but even as [they]4759-the mourners spake [them]4759-the mourners , [she]4763-she felt that they were but words , hollow and empty as the greetings in [the market - place with which [we]4765-us salute [our]4765-us indifferent acquaintance]4766-the market - place with which we salute our indifferent acquaintance . Was [she]4763-she so sure that the change had been a happy one ? It was a change from the known to the unknown , from moderate certain evils , and moderate probable good , to infinite possibilities of horror or blessedness . Where lay [this heaven]4767-this heaven , [this promised land]4768-this promised land , where [we]4765-us so confidently lodge [our]4765-us dead ? Was it up above that highest bluest arch that looks in truth pure enough , and solid enough , to be the floor of some sweet elysium ? Ah ! no ! Human knowledge , that like [a naughty , prying child]4769-a naughty , prying child , has found out at once so infinitely too much and too little , tells [us]4765-us that that skyey vault is but thin air . [She]4763-she thinks , shuddering—"What[410-bear] if [heaven]1042-heaven [itself]1042-heaven be but thin air ? Is it anywhere ? What if its existence at all be but the fine - spun fancy of poor human hearts , that must needs frame for [themselves]2028-themselves some blessed definite hope , since real hope have [they]2028-themselves none ? Is it a beautiful tender fraud practised by [themselves]2028-themselves upon [themselves]2028-themselves , to save [them]2028-themselves from the despair of the black vagueness into which [they]2028-themselves must send out [[their]2028-themselves departed ones]2029-their departed ones , and go out [themselves]2028-themselves when life 's little day is over ? Oh , light ! light ! When [the great God]2030-the great god said , ' Let there be light ! ' in [the material world]2031-the material world , why did not lie say so too in the world of spirits ? [I]0-i know that [my]0-i soul shall live for ever ! [I]0-i know that there is that within [me]0-i over which the most insatiable of monsters , insatiabler than [any slain in classic tale]2032-any slain in classic tale — a monster that turns beauty to unsightliness , whose handmaid is corruption , and whose drink is tears — has no power . But alas ! alas ! can [I]0-i rejoice in [my]0-i immortality , when [I]0-i know not where , or under what conditions , those endless , endless eons will roll [themselves]2033-themselves away into the past ? " "[2034-we] [We]2034-we must bow beneath the rod , " says [old Mrs. Brandon]201-mrs. brandon , nodding [her]201-mrs. brandon head and [her]201-mrs. brandon poke bonnet . It is the identical poke bonnet , and not another , in which [she]201-mrs. brandon once paid [her]201-mrs. brandon congratulatory visit . The summer sun had browned it a little , but otherwise it is in a state of high efficiency . "[2034-we] [We]2034-we must bow beneath the rod , knowing that it is a tender [Father]412-father 's hand that wields it . " "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose so , " answers [Esther]148-esther , listlessly . To [her]148-esther it seems a matter of indifference whose hand it was that inflicted such an immedicable hurt , seeing that it has been inflicted by [some one]686-some one , and now yawns , a gaping rift in [her]148-esther soul , never to be assuaged by any balsam . "[0-i] Suppose ! " cries [Miss Bessy]202-bessy , [her]202-bessy long , uncertain nose reddening a little in [her]202-bessy righteous zeal , at the slackness of [Esther]148-esther 's faith . "[0-i] Surely , surely , if [we]2034-we are [Believers]2035-believers , there can be no ' suppose ' in such a case . " "[0-i] [I]0-i did not mean to express any doubt , " [Esther]148-esther says , gently , but wearily . "[0-i] Suppose will not do [us]2034-we much good at the Last Day , " continues [Miss Bessy]202-bessy , rather venomously . "[0-i] Unless [we]2034-we can lay fast hold upon [Jesus]413-jesus " ( laying hold of a roll of paper to exemplify the tenacity of [her]148-esther own grasp * ) , "[0-i] unless [we]2034-we have assurance that [we]2034-we are [Elect]414-elect , where are [we]2034-we ? " "[0-i] If it is any comfort to [you]2036-you , love , [you]2036-you know that [you]2036-you have [our]2034-we prayers , " says [Mrs. Brandon]201-mrs. brandon , squeezing [Esther]148-esther 's hand . "[2036-you] [We]2034-we have set apart a special day with [several Christian friends]2037-several christian friends , " says [Bessy]202-bessy , with animation , "[2034-we] to wrestle in prayer for [you]2036-you , that this searching dispensation may be blessed to [your]2036-you conversion — that [you]2036-you may find [the Lord]2038-the lord . " "[2034-we] Thanks , " answers [Esther]148-esther , meekly , too broken - down to resent even the indignity of being set up on a metaphorical stool of repentance , amid a select circle of [[Miss Bessy]202-bessy 's Christian friends]4771-miss bessy 's christian friends . "[2034-we] If [we]2034-we could send [you]2036-you anything from [Plas Berwyn]38-plas berwyn — " begins [Mrs. Brandon]201-mrs. brandon . "[2034-we] Any books or leaflets , " interrupts [Bessy]202-bessy . "[2034-we] Any eatables , or anything of that kind , " amends [[her]148-esther mother]3717-her mother . "[0-i] [I]0-i daresay [you]2036-you have not been thinking much about housekeeping lately , [[my]0-i poor child]2039-my poor child ; and [you]2036-you know whenever [you]2036-you feel inclined to come to [us]2034-we for good , [you]2036-you will always find open hearts and open arms , " concludes [the good old woman]4773-the good old woman , suiting [her]4773-the good old woman action to [her]4773-the good old woman words , and folding [Esther]148-esther in a black bombazine embrace . "[2036-you] Thank [you]0-i very much , " replies [the girl]682-the girl , gratefully , [her]682-the girl low , sad voice almost smothered by [[her]682-the girl mamma]4775-her mamma - in - law 's bonnet strings , amongst which [her]682-the girl little disconsolate head is lying perdue . "[0-i] [We]2034-we are only broken cisterns , [you]0-i should remember , [mamma]837-mamma , " says [Bessy]202-bessy , a little reprovingly of [[her]682-the girl parent]4776-her parent 's carnal materialism ; "[837-mamma] leaky vessels , all of [us]2034-we ! [You]0-i should direct [Esther]148-esther to the one [Ebenezer]415-ebenezer . " The race of [Eliphaz the Temanite]416-eliphaz the temanite , [Bildad the Shuhite]417-bildad the shuhite , and [Zophar the Naamathite]418-zophar the naamathite , is by no means extinct : if not in the male line , at all events in [the female]4777-the female , it still survives in the person of many a [Miss Bessy Brandon]202-bessy . [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon has been busy all day with [[Jack]146-jack 's lawyer]4778-jack 's lawyer : returning in the afternoon , [he]4778-jack 's lawyer finds [Esther]148-esther sitting on the study window - ledge , on which [she]148-esther and [Jack]146-jack used to sit on summer nights , and watch the little feathery , plumy clouds sail along the sky 's sapphire sea ; used to watch "[0-i] The large white stars rise one by one , " and speculate who lived in them , and what they were made of . [Jack]146-jack has entered into the ranks of [the initiated]4779-the initiated , but [she]148-esther still sits and wonders . "[0-i] Come out for a stroll , [Essie]180-essie , " says [the young man]670-the young man , stooping over [her]180-essie till [his]670-the young man yellow beard , curly as a bull 's forehead , almost touches [her]180-essie dark , drooped head . "[180-essie] If [you]2041-you like , " [she]180-essie answers , indifferently ; and so drags [herself]180-essie slowly up , and walks away heavily to get ready . "[180-essie] Where shall [we]2042-we go ? " inquires [he]670-the young man , as [they]2042-we stand at [the farmyard]4696-the farmyard gate . [The callow Cochin chickens]4782-the callow cochin chickens have grown up , and are stalking about , in all the dignity of long , yellow legs and adolescence , under the frames of the corn - ricks . "[180-essie] Where shall [we]2042-we go?—to see [[my]0-i mother]3406-my mother ? " "[180-essie] That would be returning [her]3406-my mother visit almost too promptly , " answers [the young girl]3585-the young girl , with a weary smile ; "[180-essie] it is not more than half an hour since [they]2044-they left [this house]2045-this house . " "[2044-they] [They]2044-they ! Were [[my]0-i sisters]1023-my sisters here too , then ? " inquires [Bob]190-bob , quickly ; [his]190-bob confidence in [[his]190-bob sisters]3480-his sisters ' infallibility as to words and actions not being so perfect as in [[his]190-bob mamma]4258-his mamma 's . "[0-i] [I]0-i hope [their]2044-they coming did not worry [you]0-i much . " "[0-i] Nothing worries [me]0-i now , " [she]0-i answers , calmly ; "[0-i] [I]0-i defy anything to worry , or anger , or frighten [me]0-i . Do [you]0-i remember a line of [Mrs. Barrett Browning]419-mrs. barrett browning 's ? Oh no , by - the - bye , [you]0-i never read poetry — " ' Fallen too low for special fear . ' That is exactly [my]419-mrs. barrett browning case . "[419-mrs. barrett browning] " [I]201-mrs. brandon never know the right sort of thing to say , do n't [you]0-i know , "[201-mrs. brandon] remarks [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon , rather awkwardly , looking down , and poking about little pebbles with the end of [his]2047-his stick . " But [I]201-mrs. brandon had hoped that [mother]826-mother might have hit upon something that would have comforted [you]0-i a little . "[201-mrs. brandon] " [She]826-mother meant to , [I]148-esther am sure , "[148-esther] replies [Esther]148-esther , gravely . " [She]826-mother was very kind , and so were [the girls]906-the girls , [I]148-esther suppose ; only some of [Bessy]202-bessy 's speeches rather reminded [me]148-esther of [Eliphaz the Temanite]416-eliphaz the temanite 's , ' Remember , [I]148-esther pray [thee]4788-thee , who ever perished , being innocent ? or where were the righteous cut off ? ' "[148-esther] " [I]2048-that young lady wish to heaven that [Bessy]202-bessy could be possessed with a dumb devil ! "[2048-that young lady] says [[that young lady]2048-that young lady 's brother]2049-that young lady 's brother , looking up , red with sudden anger . " [No one]891-no one should ever have [my]2048-that young lady leave to try and cast it out . "[2048-that young lady] " Let [us]2052-they go to [the common]4790-the common , "[148-esther] [Esther]148-esther says , abruptly , not heeding [him]2049-that young lady 's brother . [THE common]4790-the common stretches , long and stony , at the top of [th hill that backs [Glan - yr - Afon]24-glan - yr - afon]2051-th hill that backs glan - yr - afon . To reach it [they]2052-they have to climb through [the waving woods]2053-the waving woods , where the beeches and sycamores emulously cast down their crimson and amber leaves to strew the path before [their]2052-they feet . To reach [it]4790-the common , [they]2052-they have to pass [[the woodman]2054-the woodman 's stone cottage]2055-the woodman 's stone cottage , [[his]2054-the woodman pigstye]2056-his pigstye , and [his]2054-the woodman little yap - yapping rude dog . From [the common]4790-the common [you]2058-you may look upwards or downwards — northwards , to [the valley - head]2059-the valley - head ; southwards , to [the sea]601-the sea . From among the scant brown mountain - grass , the limestone crops frequent , in peaks , and slabs , and riven rock- fragments . Far down in chinks and crevices little black - stemmed ferns grow darkling , and over [the rock]2061-the rock 's rough face , the lichens , drab and yellow , make [their]2052-they little plans and charts . One may fancy [some former people of strong giants]2062-some former people of strong giants sleeping very sweetly beneath those unchiselled tombstones , with [their]2062-some former people of strong giants epitaphs written out fairly in [Nature]162-nature 's hand in green mosses and rain furrows . In spring [the hill]648-the hill 's harsh front is crowned with a yellow splendour of gorse - flowers , but now a single blossom blows here and there desolate , just to hinder the old saying from being quite a lie . Below , in [the valley]587-the valley , the mists roll greyly ; and out above [them]2065-them Naullan church spire rises , pointing heavenwards , as if showing the way to the dead flock gathered round its feet ; points heavenwards , like the finger of [some sculptured saint]2066-some sculptured saint . The autumn winds are piping bleakly , singing an ugly peevish dirge for the gone summer , bending the frost - seared brake - fern all one way , and with rough hands pushing back [Robert]147-robert and [Esther]148-esther , saying , " This is [[our]4791-our territory]4792-our territory ; what brings [you]201-mrs. brandon [here]3398-here ? "[148-esther] [Esther]148-esther shivers . " [You]2068-i are cold , [I]201-mrs. brandon 'm afraid , "[201-mrs. brandon] says [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon , anxiously , putting [his]2067-his head on one side , not out of sentimentality , but in the endeavour to keep [his]2067-his hat on . " Yes , "[2068-i] [she]2068-i answers , rapidly ; " and [I]2068-i 'm glad of it . [I]2068-i should hate to feel warm and comfortable ; [I]2068-i want to be cold , and faint , and miserable always . Do [you]2067-his know , "[2068-i] [she]2068-i continues , excitedly , laying [her]2068-i hand on [his]2067-his arm , " yesterday [I]2068-i laughed ? — yes ! [I]2068-i actually laughed ! and it is only a fortnight since — wasn't it horrible of [me]2068-i ? [I]2068-i want the days and the weeks to go by quickly : [I]2068-i want it to be a long time since [Jack]146-jack died ! "[2068-i] [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon makes no answer — partly because [he]2067-his is utterly at a loss for a reply , partly because [he]2067-his is still wrestling with [his]2067-his hat . Presently [they]2069-them come to [a disused quarry]2070-a disused quarry , where [the quarrymen]2071-the quarrymen have hewn out rock - ledges into comfortable seats for [them]2071-the quarrymen . The wind howls above [them]2069-them , angry and sad , and flings hither and thither the flowerless broom - pikes that look over [the cliffs]2072-the cliffs , but it can not reach [them]2069-them . " [Esther]148-esther , "[190-bob] says [Bob]190-bob , taking up a sharp stone , and beginning to draw white lines on [the rock]2061-the rock 's smooth surface , " it seems as if [I]190-bob had no other occupation nowadays than to say disagreeable things to [you]148-esther , but [I]190-bob can not help it : do [you]148-esther think [you]148-esther can bear to leave [Glan - yr - Afon]24-glan - yr - afon in three weeks or so ? "[190-bob] " [Bear]410-bear ! "[2074-i] [she]2074-i repeats , bitterly ; " [I]2074-i can bear anything — [I]2074-i have proved that already , [I]2074-i think . [Any one that had had any feeling]4794-any one that had had any feeling would have died of this ; but [I]2074-i — [I]2074-i sleep and eat as well as ever : [I]2074-i am like the baker who refused [Christ the loaf]420-christ the loaf — [I]2074-i can not die ! "[2074-i] " Hush ! "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says , eagerly ; " do n't want to go before [your]148-esther time , or perhaps [the Almighty]4795-the almighty might take [you]148-esther at [your]148-esther word . "[190-bob] There is silence for a moment or two , then [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon speaks again : " At the end of three weeks [you]2075-i will come to [us]4796-us then ? "[201-mrs. brandon] No answer . Thinking that the wind has carried away [his]190-bob words , [he]190-bob repeats [his]190-bob question : " At the end of three weeks [you]2075-i will come to [us]4796-us , then ? "[190-bob] [She]2075-i turns [her]2075-i head round slowly . " Could not [I]2075-i live in some hovel by [myself]2075-i ? "[2075-i] [He]190-bob shakes [his]190-bob head . " Impossible ! [You]2075-i see , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says , speaking with slow reluctance , " [he]190-bob — [poor dear fellow]4797-poor dear fellow ! — laid out a great deal of money on all the latest improvements in farming implements , and things of that kind , and [they]4798-they did not bring [him]190-bob anything back ; [they]4798-they would have done , no doubt , if [he]190-bob had been given time , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob adds , quickly , afraid of seeming to cast the faintest slur upon [the dead boy]2076-the dead boy . " [You]190-bob mean to say that [I]2075-i have no money — that [I]2075-i am [a beggar]1813-a beggar , "[2075-i] [she]2075-i says , fixing [her]2075-i clear , steadfast eyes upon [him]190-bob : and in them is none of that dismay which [her]2075-i words seem to imply . " [I]190-bob mean to say , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob answers , heartily , " that henceforth [you]2075-i are to be one of [us]4800-us , and that [we]4800-us are very , very glad of it . "[190-bob] [She]2075-i does not say " Thank [you]190-bob ; "[2075-i] [she]2075-i neither assents nor refuses ; [she]2075-i only looks away , and watches the distant trees tossing violent arms , in riotous fight with the wind . Something in [her]2075-i manner makes [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon uneasy . " It is agreed , then ? "[190-bob] [he]190-bob asks , eagerly . No reply . " Why do n't [you]190-bob answer [me]190-bob , [Esther]148-esther ? "[190-bob] ( with a slight natural impatience in [his]190-bob tone ) . [She]2075-i turns [her]2075-i face slowly round towards [him]190-bob — a face paled by [her]2075-i late agonies , thinned by long fastings , and by thousands of great tears . " Because , "[2075-i] [she]2075-i replies , " [I]2075-i have [one friend in [the world]672-the world]4801-one friend in the world now ; and when [I]2075-i have answered [you]190-bob , [I]2075-i shall have none ! "[2075-i] " What do [you]190-bob mean ? "[2075-i] " If [I]2075-i were to come to [you]190-bob , [I]2075-i should come as [[your]190-bob supposed future wife]4803-your supposed future wife , should n't [I]2075-i ? Well , [I]2075-i should be [an impostor]4211-an impostor . "[2075-i] A great sickening fear whitens [his]190-bob brown face , but [he]190-bob contains [himself]190-bob , and speaks quietly : " Do [you]190-bob think [I]190-bob meant to bargain with [you]190-bob ? Do [you]190-bob think [I]190-bob meant to make a profit for [myself]190-bob out of [your]190-bob troubles ? What have [I]190-bob ever done to make [you]190-bob think [me]190-bob so mean ? "[190-bob] [he]190-bob asks , reproachfully . [She]2077-she draws a heavy sighing breath . " Why am [I]2077-she beating about the bush ? "[2077-she] [she]2077-she says , chiding [herself]2077-she ; " it must out , sooner or later ! Oh , [Bob]190-bob ! [Bob]190-bob ! if [I]2077-she had it in [me]2077-she to be sorry about anything , [I]2077-she should be sorry about this ! "[2077-she] " About what ? "[190-bob] [he]190-bob asks , cruelly excited . " Look this way , [Esther]148-esther . Is it — is it what [I]2077-she have been afraid of all along ? "[2077-she] [Her]2077-she head sinks in shamed dejection on [her]2077-she breast . " Yes , it is , "[2077-she] [she]2077-she answers , faintly . There will be a great storm at [sea]2078-sea to - night ; the gulls are circling about , calling wildly to [one another]922-one another - [here , twenty miles inland]2080-here , twenty miles inland . " Who is it ? "[190-bob] asks [Bob]190-bob , in a husky whisper , presently . [She]2077-she sighs again , profoundly . " Do [you]190-bob remember , "[2077-she] [she]2077-she says , " before [I]2077-she went to [the Gerards'—how]421-the gerards'—how many hundred years ago was [that?—your]4805-that?—your saying one day that [you]190-bob wished [they]421-the gerards'—how had not got [a son]977-a son , and [my]2077-she laughing at [you]190-bob about it ? Well ! [you]190-bob were right!—it is [he]977-a son ! "[2077-she] [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon turns away [his]2081-his head , speaks not , nor gives any sign . It is in silence that [a good brave man]2082-a good brave man meetliest takes [his]2082-a good brave man deathblow . " [I]148-esther do n't think [he]977-a son would have cared much about [me]148-esther , if [I]148-esther had let [him]977-a son alone , "[148-esther] says [Esther]148-esther , taking a sort of gloomy pleasure in painting [herself]148-esther as black as possible . There is a pause — a pause , during which [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon is fighting one of those duels in which [most men]885-most men have to engage at least once in [their]885-most men lives — the duel with a mortal agony , that says , tauntingly , " [I]2084-which one that is valiant am [[your]190-bob master]4807-your master ! [I]2084-which one that is valiant have conquered [you]190-bob ! "[2084-which one that is valiant] to [which one that is valiant]2084-which one that is valiant makes answer , " [You]190-bob are strong , [you]190-bob are terrible ; but [you]190-bob are not [[my]2084-which one that is valiant master]1021-my master . [I]2084-which one that is valiant will keep [you]190-bob under ! "[2084-which one that is valiant] " [You]2090-i will go to [him]2085-him then , of course , instead of coming to [us]4809-us ? "[2085-him] [he]2085-him says , presently , speaking in [some one else]3400-some one else 's voice ( for it certainly is not [his]2085-him own ) , and keeping [his]2085-him head turned away ; for [no one]891-no one is willing to parade [their]2088-their death - pangs before [others]4701-others ' eyes . [She]2090-i laughs derisively . " Go to [him]2085-him ! Hardly ! [I]2090-i should get but an indifferent welcome if [I]2090-i did . [You]2085-him know [I]2090-i never told [him]2085-him a word about [you]2085-him — ladylike and honourable of [me]2090-i , was n't it?—but [some one else]3400-some one else did [him]2085-him that good office ; and now , if [he]2085-him were to see [me]2090-i falling over the edge of [that cliff]4811-that cliff , [he]2085-him would not put out a finger to save [me]2090-i . That is [his]2085-him sort of love ! "[2090-i] [She]2090-i ends , bitterly , " And [I]2090-i think [he]2085-him is right . "[2090-i] Another longer silence . [Brandon]201-mrs. brandon is wrestling with that adversary of [his]2091-his , that deadly anger and pain ; that riotous tigerish jealousy , that makes [us]2092-us all murderers for the time , in thought at least ; that mad , wild longing — madder , wilder than any love ardour , than any paroxysm of religious zeal — to have [his]2091-his hands , for one moment of strong ecstasy . about the throat of [the rich man that has robbed [him]2091-his of [his]2091-his one ewe lamb]2093-the rich man that has robbed him of his one ewe lamb . The sweat of that combat stands cold upon [his]2091-his brow , but [he]2091-his overcomes . After a while [he]2091-his speaks gently , as one would speak to [a little sick child]2094-a little sick child : " Were [you]2090-i very fond of [him]2085-him , [Esther]148-esther ? "[2091-his] " [I]2090-i suppose so , "[2090-i] [she]2090-i answers with reflective calmness , looking straight before [her]2090-i . " [I]2090-i must have been , or [I]2090-i should not have said and done the mean things [I]2090-i did . [I]2090-i should not have degraded [myself]2090-i into begging [him]2085-him to take [me]2090-i back again , when [I]2090-i might as well have begged of this rock "[2090-i] ( thrusting [her]2090-i soft hand against it ) " to turn to grass and flowers . [He]2085-him told [me]2090-i that [he]2085-him would never forgive [me]2090-i , either in [this world]549-this world or the next ! [I]2090-i thought it very dreadful at the time , but [I]2090-i do n't much care now whether [he]2085-him forgives [me]2090-i or not . "[2090-i] " Have [you]2090-i forgotten [him]2085-him so completely already ? "[190-bob] asks [Bob]190-bob , forgetting [his]190-bob own misery for the moment , in sheer blank amazement . " Forgotten [him]2085-him ! "[2090-i] [she]2090-i repeats thoughtfully . " No , not that [I]2090-i not that ! [I]2090-i might as well try to forget [myself]2090-i . [I]2090-i remember every line of [his]2085-him face , [his]2085-him voice , and [his]2085-him ways , and every word [he]2085-him said almost ; but if [I]2090-i were to see [him]2085-him standing close to [us]2095-us here , [I]2090-i should not feel the slightest inclination to go to [him]2085-him , or to call [him]2085-him to come to [me]2090-i . [I]2090-i feel all dead everywhere . "[2090-i] [They]2095-us remain in the same attitude for several minutes , neither of [them]2095-us stirring nor uttering a word . Then [Esther]148-esther speaks , with a certain uneasy abruptness . " Well ! "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , " [I]148-esther am waiting!—waiting for [you]4813-you to call [me]148-esther [a murderess]4814-a murderess and [a bad woman]4815-a bad woman , and all the other names that [St. John]164-st. john gave [me]148-esther , on much less provocation . Make haste ! "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , with a nervous forced laugh ; " [I]148-esther am in a hurry to hear that [I]148-esther have succeeded in getting rid of [[my]148-esther last friend]4816-my last friend . Quick ! quick!—tell [me]148-esther that [you]2096-you hate [me]148-esther , and have done with it ! "[148-esther] " Hate [you]148-esther ! "[2096-you] [he]2096-you repeats , tenderly ; [his]2096-you brave voice trembling a little in spite of [himself]2096-you , and the meekness of a great heroism ennobling [his]2096-you face . " [You]148-esther , [poor soul]4817-poor soul ! Why should [I]2096-you hate [you]148-esther because [another man]3623-another man is better and more loveable than [I]2096-you , and because [you]148-esther have eyes to see it ? "[2096-you] The eyes [he]2096-you speaks of turn upon [him]2096-you , wide and startled , in astonished disbelief of [his]2096-you great generosity . " [You]2096-you do n't understand ! "[2097-i] [she]2097-i says , quickly . " [You]2096-you do n't take it in . [I]2097-i was engaged to [him]2096-you ; [I]2097-i was going to marry [him]2096-you , and all the time [I]2097-i never once mentioned [your]2096-you name to [him]2096-you , of [my]2097-i own accord ; and when [he]2096-you asked [me]2097-i about [you]2096-you , [I]2097-i said [you]2096-you were only [a common acquaintance]4819-a common acquaintance . [You]2096-you must hate [me]2097-i ! "[2097-i] [she]2097-i ends , vehemently ; " do n't pretend that [you]2096-you do n't ! "[2097-i] " Hush ! "[2098-i] [he]2098-i answers sorrowfully , but very gently , " that is nonsense ! [I]2098-i do n't even hate [him]2096-you ; at least "[2098-i] ( pausing a moment , to thrust down and trample under foot one more spasm of that intolerable burning jealousy)—"at least , [I]2098-i try not . It was [my]2098-i own fault . [I]2098-i knew all along that [I]2098-i was poor , and stupid , and awkward , that [I]2098-i had nothing but sheer love to give [you]2096-you , and [I]2098-i hoped against hope that that might win [you]2096-you at last . [We]4820-we all set [our]4820-we affections upon some one thing , [I]2098-i suppose , "[2098-i] [he]2098-i says , with a patient , pitiful smile , " and [I]2098-i daresay it is all the better for [us]4820-we in the end that [we]4820-we do n't often get it : but oh , love ! love ! [you]2096-you might have told [me]2098-i ! "[2098-i] Then [his]2098-i resolution breaks a little , and , covering [his]2098-i face with [his]2098-i hands , [he]2098-i groans aloud , in [a man]3402-a man 's dry - eyed agony — how much awfuller to see than [a woman]553-a woman 's little tears , that flow indifferently for a dead pet dog , or [a dead husband]2101-a dead husband ! [Esther]148-esther sits looking at [him]2098-i during several minutes , awestruck , as [a child that has made [a grown - up person]1704-a grown - up person]2102-a child that has made a grown - up person cry ; then one of those quick impulses that carry [some women]1155-some women away seizes [her]148-esther . " [Bob]190-bob ! "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , putting [her]148-esther sweet mouth close to [his]2098-i ear , while [her]148-esther gentle , vibrating voice thrills down to [his]2098-i stricken soul , " [I]148-esther have been very bad to [you]2098-i , but [I]148-esther will make up for it ! "[148-esther] " Will [you]148-esther ? "[2098-i] [he]2098-i says , looking up with a mournful , sceptical smile ; " how ? "[2098-i] " [I]148-esther 'll marry [you]2098-i , if [you]2098-i 'll have [me]148-esther , and make [a very good wife to [you]2098-i]4821-a very good wife to you , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , simply , with unblushing calmness , eyelids unlowered , and voice unwavering . " [Child]3639-child ! "[2098-i] [he]2098-i cries , " [you]3639-child are very generous , but do [you]3639-child think [I]2098-i can not be generous too ? "[2098-i] " It is not generosity , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , eagerly ; " [I]148-esther wish to marry [you]2098-i ! "[148-esther] [He]2098-i shakes [his]2098-i head sadly . " [You]3639-child do n't know what [you]3639-child are saying , "[2098-i] [he]2098-i answers , taking [her]148-esther little hand between both [his]2098-i — holding it almost fatherly , in a tender prison . " [You]3639-child do n't know what marriage is . [You]3639-child do n't understand that a union so close with [a person [you]3639-child do n't love]4823-a person you do n't love would be infinitely worse than being tied to a dead body ; [the one]3424-the one could not last very long , the other might for years . "[2098-i] [She]148-esther looks at [him]2098-i silently , with [her]148-esther grave , innocent eyes , for an instant or two while [she]148-esther tries to get down to the depth of [her]148-esther own heart — tries to feel something besides that numb vague indifference to everything . " If [I]148-esther do n't love [you]2098-i , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , doubtfully , " [I]148-esther love [nobody]3405-nobody ; [I]148-esther like [you]2098-i better than [anyone else in [the world]672-the world]4826-anyone else in the world ! Did n't [Jack]146-jack die in [your]2098-i arms ? "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , breaking out into sudden and violent tears . " Was n't [his]146-jack head resting on [your]2098-i shoulder when [he]146-jack went away ? Oh , dear , dear shoulder ! "[148-esther] [she]148-esther cries , kissing it passionately . " How can [I]148-esther help loving [you]148-esther for that ? "[148-esther] At the touch of [her]148-esther soft mouth , that has been to [him]2105-his hitherto , despite [his]2105-his nominal betrothal , a sealed book , [his]2105-his steadfast heart begins to pulse frantically fast : if a river of flame instead of blood were poured through [his]2105-his veins , they could not have throbbed with an insaner heat : [his]2105-his sober head swims as one that is dizzy with strong drink ; reels in the overpowering passion of [a man that has not frittered away [his]2105-his heart in little bits , after [our]2107-our nineteenth - century fashion , but has cast it down , whole , unscarred by any other smallest wound , at [one woman]2108-one woman 's feet]2106-a man that has not frittered away his heart in little bits , after our nineteenth - century fashion , but has cast it down , whole , unscarred by any other smallest wound , at one woman 's feet . Oh , if [he]2105-his might but take [her]148-esther at [her]148-esther word ! Or , if there must be no marriage between [them]2109-them , why may not there be a brief sweet marriage of the lips ? It would do [her]148-esther no harm — since kisses , happily for the reputation of ninety - nine hundredths of [the female world]2110-the female world , leave no mark — and it would set [him]2105-his for an instant on a pinnacle of bliss that would equal [him]2105-his with [the high gods]2111-the high gods . But the paroxysm is short . Before [she]148-esther who has caused it has guessed at its existence , it is put down , held down strongly . [Women]547-women are very often like [naughty children , putting a lighted match to a train of gunpowder]2113-naughty children , putting a lighted match to a train of gunpowder , and then surprised and frightened because there is an explosion . " [You]148-esther are deceiving [yourself]148-esther , "[2105-his] [he]2105-his says , speaking almost coldly . " [You]148-esther think [you]148-esther like [me]2105-his , because [I]2105-his happened to be [the last person that was with [the dear fellow that 's gone]4829-the dear fellow that 's gone]4828-the last person that was with the dear fellow that 's gone — because [you]148-esther knew that [I]2105-his was grieved about [him]4829-the dear fellow that 's gone too : but think of [me]2105-his as [you]148-esther thought of [me]2105-his when [you]148-esther were at [the Gerards]244-the gerards ' , and [you]148-esther 'll know how much [you]148-esther love [me]2105-his for [myself]2105-his . "[2105-his] " Love ! "[2114-her] [she]2114-her repeats , dreamily—"love ! love ! "[2114-her] saying over and over again the familiar , common word , until by very dint of frequent repetition it grows unfamiliar , odd , void of meaning . " [I]2115-i have used up all [I]2115-i ever had of that : perhaps [I]2115-i never had much , but [I]2115-i think [you]2115-i [the very best man that ever lived]4830-the very best man that ever lived . Is not that enough to go upon ? "[2115-i] [He]2115-i shakes [his]2115-i head with a slight smile . " Worse and worse ! that would be a difficult character to live up to . No ! "[2115-i] [he]2115-i says , looking at [her]2114-her , with the nobility of an utter self - abnegation in [his]2115-i sorrowful blue eyes . " [I]2115-i will never marry [you]2114-her , [Essie]180-essie ! [never!—I]2115-i swear it ! If [you]2114-her were to go down on [your]2114-her knees to [me]2115-i , [I]2115-i would not : [I]2115-i should deserve that [God]435-god should strike [me]2115-i dead if [I]2115-i could be guilty of such unmanly selfishness ! "[2115-i] " [You]2115-i refuse [me]2114-her then ? "[2114-her] [she]2114-her says , with a sigh of half - unconscious relief . " Was ever such a thing heard of ? And [I]2114-her have not even the satisfaction of being able to be angry with [you]2115-i . "[2114-her] " [I]2115-i refuse [you]2114-her ! "[2115-i] [he]2115-i answers , steadily , taking [her]2114-her two little hands in [his]2115-i . " But — look at [me]2115-i , [dear]951-dear , and believe [me]2115-i — as [I]2115-i said to [you]2114-her before , so [I]2115-i say now , [I]2115-i shall love [you]2114-her to - day , and to - morrow , and always ! "[2115-i] [The two young people]2116-the two young people sit silent ; [each]2117-each looking down , as it were with inner eyes , on the wreck of [their]2116-the two young people own destiny — wrecked already [I]0-i though [[their]2116-the two young people ships]2118-their ships have so lately left [the port]2119-the port . The vapours still curl about [the dun hills]2120-the dun hills : the clouds stoop low , as if to mingle with [their]2116-the two young people sister mists . With many a sigh , and with many a shiver , the trees shower down the ruddy rain of their leaves ; earth is stripping [her]2114-her fair body for the winter sleep . Then [Brandon]190-bob speaks : " Promise [me]190-bob one thing , [Essie]180-essie ! "[190-bob] " Anything almost . "[190-bob] " That this — this — talk [we]2116-the two young people have had shall make no difference as to [your]190-bob coming to [us]2116-the two young people ! "[190-bob] " What ! "[2114-her] [she]2114-her cries , suddenly springing to [her]2114-her feet , tears of remorse and mortification rushing to [her]2114-her eyes . " After having done [you]190-bob the worst injury [a woman]553-a woman can do [a man]3402-a man , am [I]190-bob to be indebted to [you]190-bob for daily bread — for food , and clothes , and firing ? How much lower do [you]190-bob wish [me]190-bob to fall ? Have [you]190-bob no pity on [me]190-bob ? "[190-bob] " [You]180-essie are misstating the case , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says , quietly , [his]190-bob downcast eyes fixed on a little fern that , with [his]190-bob stick , [he]190-bob is up - digging from its strait home between two neighbour rocks : " [you]190-bob will be indebted to [me]190-bob for nothing ; [I]190-bob shall not even be [there]594-there ; [I]190-bob shall have gone back to [Bermuda]33-bermuda . "[190-bob] " Gone ! "[2121-she] [she]2121-she repeats , blankly . " Are [you]190-bob going too ? Is [everybody]3709-everybody going away from [me]2121-she ? And do [you]190-bob think , "[2121-she] [she]2121-she continues , passionately , " that it will be easier for [me]2121-she to lie under such an obligation to [[your]190-bob mother]3422-your mother and [sisters]3770-sisters than to [you]190-bob ? Is not it always harder to say ' Thank [you]190-bob ! ' to [a woman]553-a woman than to [a man]3402-a man ? And would not [I]2121-she immeasurably rather sell matches , or hot potatoes at [the street - corners]4840-the street - corners , than do either ? "[2121-she] [He]2122-he smiles slightly , yet very ruefully withal . " [[My]2122-he darling]1890-my darling ! "[2122-he] [he]2122-he says , looking wistfully at [her]2121-she noble head and delicate , thoroughbred face , " [you]2121-she are a great deal too pretty to sell hot potatoes , or matches either ; [bread - winners]4842-bread - winners should not have faces like [yours]2121-she ! "[2122-he] " That is bad reasoning , "[2121-she] [she]2121-she answers , trying to laugh ; " if [I]2121-she am pretty , [people]3426-people will be more likely to buy [my]2121-she wares . Oh , Heavens ! "[2121-she] [she]2121-she cries , throwing up [her]2121-she eyes to the dark wrack driving over head , " what business have [people]3426-people to bring [children]3772-children into [the world]672-the world only to starve , or to sponge upon [others]4701-others ? There ought to be an Act of Parliament against it ! Oh , why — why is not one allowed to have a look into life before [one]559-one is born — to have [one]559-one 's choice whether [one]559-one will come into it at all or no ? But , if [one]559-one had , who would come?—who would ? "[2121-she] " [I]190-bob would , "[190-bob] answers [Bob]190-bob , stoutly . " [I]190-bob do n't think [the world]672-the world is half a bad place , though it is the fashion to abuse it now - a - days , and though it does do [one some curiously dirty turns]4853-one some curiously dirty turns now and then . But after all , "[190-bob] [he]190-bob adds , very gravely , " bad or good [no one]891-no one can accuse it of lasting long , and there 's a better at the other end of it . "[190-bob] " Or a worse , "[148-esther] says [Esther]148-esther , gloomily . " Who knows ? [One]559-one can not fancy [the world]672-the world without [one]559-one , can [one]559-one ? "[148-esther] [she]148-esther continues , following out [her]148-esther own ideas . " [One]559-one knows that , not long ago , there was , and not long hence there will be , no [I]148-esther ; but one can not realize it ! "[148-esther] " Why should one bother [one]559-one 's head trying ? "[190-bob] says [Bob]190-bob , with philosophy . " The leaves seem to come out in the spring , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther continues musingly , without heeding [him]190-bob , " the winds to blow , and the birds to sing , all with some reference to [oneself]559-one : one can not understand [their]4860-their all going on when oneself has stopped ! "[148-esther] Reflections of this character are not much in [Bob]190-bob 's way . Pensive musings upon the caducity of [the human race]1381-the human race are , generally , rather feminine than masculine . [A woman]553-a woman dreams over the shortness of life , while [a man]3402-a man crowds it with doings that make it , in effect , long . [Brandon]190-bob turns the conversation back into a more practical channel . " Have [you]148-esther any friends that [you]148-esther have known longer than [you]148-esther have [us]4861-us , [Essie]180-essie ? "[190-bob] " None . "[190-bob] " Any to whom it would be less irksome to [you]148-esther to lie under an obligation , as [you]148-esther call it ? "[190-bob] " None . "[190-bob] " Any that [you]148-esther like better , in short ? "[190-bob] " None , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther answers , with a little impatience , as if , in a way , ashamed of [her]148-esther own destitution . " Good or bad , [I]190-bob have [no friends]989-no friends , [none]1161-none , and [you]148-esther know it . "[190-bob] [He]190-bob looks at [her]148-esther with a sort of shocked amazement . " [Good God]435-god ! what is to become of [you]148-esther , then ? "[190-bob] [he]190-bob asks , bluntly . " [I]190-bob do n't know . "[190-bob] " How are [you]148-esther to live ? "[190-bob] " [I]190-bob do n't know . "[190-bob] " Have [you]148-esther never once thought about it ? "[190-bob] " Never . [I]148-esther thought that [we]4864-we , "[148-esther] [she]148-esther says , [her]148-esther lips beginning to quiver piteously , and [her]148-esther faithful thoughts , that never wander far from it , straying back to the new bare grave , where one half of that " [we]4864-we "[190-bob] lies sleeping—"I thought that [we]4864-we should have lived to be old together : [most people]3703-most people live to be old ! "[148-esther] A great yearning pity — purer , nobler , with less of [the satyr]2126-the satyr and more of the god in it , than in any access of human passion between [man]3613-man and [woman]3638-woman — seizes [him]190-bob as [he]190-bob looks at [her]148-esther , sitting there so forlorn , with one thin hand lifted to shield [her]148-esther weary purple - lidded eyes , that have grown dim with weeping for " [[her]148-esther boy]4628-her boy . "[190-bob] " [Poor little soul]4867-poor little soul ! "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says , compassionately ; and [he]190-bob takes , with brotherly intimacy , the other hand , that lies listless in [her]148-esther lap , and lays fond lips upon it . When [one]559-one is on the verge of a burst of crying , a harsh word may avert the catastrophe , but a kind one inevitably precipitates it . With how unjust , unreasonable a hatred does one often regard [the person who ill - advisedly speaks that kind word]2130-the person who ill - advisedly speaks that kind word ! As for [Esther]148-esther , [she]148-esther buries [her]148-esther face on [his]190-bob shoulder and begins to sob hysterically . [Her]148-esther hat falls off , and [her]148-esther bare , defenceless head leans on [his]190-bob breast , while the autumn wind wafts one long lock of [her]148-esther scented hair against [his]190-bob face . [She]148-esther has forgotten that [he]190-bob was [[her]148-esther lover]683-her lover , has forgotten that [he]190-bob is [a man]3402-a man ; [she]148-esther remembers only that [he]190-bob is [a friend]1386-a friend , which is a sexless thing — that [he]190-bob is the one being who cares about [her]148-esther , in all [the great , full , crowded world]2134-the great , full , crowded world . Despite the utter abandonment of [her]148-esther attitude , despite the clinging closeness of [her]148-esther soft supple form to [his]190-bob , [he]190-bob feels none of the painful stings of passion that so lately beset [him]190-bob . [They]2135-they are tamed , for the moment , by a nobler emotion : [they]2135-they dare as little assail [him]190-bob now , as [they]2135-they dare assail [the holy saints in [Paradise]78-'s paradise]2136-the holy saints in paradise . With [any other man such abandonment]2137-any other man such abandonment might have been dangerous : with [him]190-bob [she]148-esther is safe . [He]190-bob lays [his]190-bob kind broad hand on [her]148-esther ruffled head , and strokes it , just as [Jack]146-jack used to do , in the pleasant days before [he]146-jack went . " Come to [us]4868-us , [Essie]180-essie ! "[190-bob] [he]190-bob says , with persuasive tenderness ; " [we]4868-us 'll be good to [you]180-essie ; [we]4868-us wo n't plague [you]180-essie ; [you]180-essie would have come to [us]4868-us as [[my]190-bob wife]3795-my wife , why wo n't [you]180-essie come as [[my]190-bob sister]3784-my sister ? "[190-bob] " Because [I]148-esther like buying things better than being given them ! "[148-esther] [she]148-esther answers , vehemently , though still incoherent from [her]148-esther tears . " If [I]148-esther had come as [[your]190-bob wife]1805-your wife , [I]148-esther should . have given [you]180-essie something in exchange,—myself , body and soul , [my]148-esther whole life . It would have been of no value really , but [you]180-essie would have thought it something ; as [[your]180-essie sister]808-your sister , [I]148-esther shall give [you]180-essie absolutely nothing ! "[148-esther] " [Child]391-child ! [child]3639-child ! why are [you]3639-child so proud ? "[2138-you] [he]2138-you asks , with mournful reproachfulness . " Why are [you]3639-child so bent on standing alone ? Which of [us]4874-us can stand alone in [this world]549-this world ? [We]4874-us all have to lean upon [one another]922-one another , more or less , and the strongest of [us]4874-us upon [God]435-god ! "[148-esther] " Yes , [I]2139-i know [that!—I]2139-i know that ! "[2139-i] [she]2139-i answers , hastily ; " but [I]2139-i would far rather beg , and have to be obliged to [any common stranger]4877-any common stranger that [I]2139-i had never seen before , and that most probably [I]2139-i should never see again , than to [you]2138-you . With [them]4877-any common stranger [I]2139-i should , at all events , start fair : [I]2139-i should have no old debts to weigh [me]2139-i down ; but to [you]2138-you [I]2139-i owe so much already , that [I]2139-i am racking [my]2139-i brain to think how [I]2139-i can pay some part of it , instead of contracting new ones . "[2139-i] " [You]2139-i would contract [no new ones]4878-no new ones , "[2140-me] [he]2140-me rejoins , earnestly ; " on the contrary . [Essie]180-essie , [you]2139-i told [me]2140-me just now that [you]2139-i would be very glad to be able to make up to [me]2140-me for any pain [you]2139-i may have made [me]2140-me suffer : now is [your]2139-i time!—now is [your]2139-i opportunity ! "[2140-me] " How ? "[2141-you] [she]2141-you sobs , lifting up [her]2141-you head , and speaking with a slow , plaintive intonation . " [You]2139-i will be at [the other side of [the world]672-the world]4879-the other side of the world , thousands of miles away ! How will it affect [you]2139-i ? "[2141-you] " [I]2140-me shall be at [the other side of the world]4879-the other side of the world , "[2140-me] [he]2140-me answers , steadily ; " better that [I]2140-me should be so ! better so ! But do [you]2139-i think that [my]2140-me being so far away will make it pleasanter for [me]2140-me to think of [the one creature [I]2140-me love above all others on the face of [the earth]708-the earth]4882-the one creature i love above all others on the face of the earth , starving , or worse than starving , at [home]701-home ? "[2140-me] " Worse than starving ! "[2141-you] [she]2141-you repeats , opening [her]2141-you great , wide eyes in astonishment . " What can be worse than starving ? Oh ! [I]2141-you see what [you]2140-me mean "[2141-you] ( a light breaking in upon [her]2141-you , and the colour flushing faintly into [her]2141-you face ) . " [You]2140-me think [I]2141-you should go to the bad — do something disgraceful , if [I]2141-you had [nobody]3405-nobody to look after [me]2141-you : [I]2141-you am sorry [you]2140-me have such a bad opinion of [me]2141-you , but [I]2141-you do n't wonder at it , "[2141-you] [she]2141-you ends , with resigned depression . " [I]2142-i have no bad opinion of [you]2141-you ! "[2142-i] [he]2142-i answers , eagerly ; " but [I]2142-i know the end that [women]547-women , originally as pure and good as [you]2141-you , have come to before now . [I]2142-i know how hard it is for [a beautiful poor girl]4887-a beautiful poor girl to live honestly in [this world]549-this world , how frightfully easy to live dishonestly ! "[2142-i] " Well ! "[2141-you] [she]2141-you says , recklessly ; " and if [I]2141-you did live dishonestly , what matter ? Whom have [I]2141-you got to be ashamed of ? Whom have [I]2141-you got to disgrace ? "[2141-you] [Brandon]190-bob looks inexpressibly shocked . " Hush ! "[2142-i] [he]2142-i says , putting [his]2142-i hand before [her]2141-you mouth ; " [you]2141-you do n't know what [you]2141-you are saying !
